RulesName: Copy Subject Person and Number from nouns to verbs
Comment: Gen. 40:17  There were many kinds of bread in those baskets.

RulesName: When Subject is 'one/each of us/you/them', set Person to Third
Comment: Genesis 42:16, 19  One of you has to ...  By setting the Person of Subject value to Third, the spellout rule that inserts has to will be properly triggered.  Exodus 22:9  One of those men owns that thing.  Bible Stories 72:7  Each of us has traveled ...

RulesName: If Coordinate Subject NPs are joined with or, set Person of Subject to Singular
Comment: Luke 14:5  If your son or your ox falls ...

RulesName: For 'may' constructions (May God bless you.), there's no Subject Agreement
